message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_TO_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The To date, %1d, must be on or after the From date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_WITH_SAME_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: %1s is already a provider group participant of type, %2c, from %3d to %4d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_WITH_SAME_TYPE_EXISTS_WITHOUT_END_DATE
message.locale: %1s is already a provider group participant of type, %2c, from %3d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_CANCELLED_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The provider group participant has been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_DATE_OF_BIRTH_LATER_THAN_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The From date, %1d, must be on or after provider group participant Date of Birth, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_DATE_OF_DEATH_EARLIER_THAN_TO_DATE
message.locale: %1s is deceased with a date of death of %2d and cannot be a provider group participant.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_PARTICIPANT_XRV_PARTICIPANTS_HAVING_DATE_OF_DEATH
message.locale: %1s is deceased with a date of death of %2d and cannot be a provider group participant.
